motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of February 26, 2024 meeting minutes, second read text amendments to Chapter 2 (Board of Ethics) and Chapter 4 (Alcohol License Review Board), and funding authorization for storm repairs at two locations.

motions.title: Resolution for Budget Amendment for Fiscal Year 2023
motions.description: Approval of resolution for budget amendment cleanup for fiscal year 2023, with revenue expected to exceed expenditures and close to ten month reserve in general fund.

motions.title: Purchase Signal Poles for Pedestrian Hybrid Beacon Installations
motions.description: Approval to purchase signal poles for pedestrian hybrid beacon installations on Perimeter Center West and North Peachtree Road, purchased ahead of contract award due to lead time.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to adjourn for executive session to discuss real estate.
